notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Ismail owed $2,350 in taxes. He has a child tax credit of $2,000 and an earned income tax credit of $1,640. After applying the tax credit, how much does Ismail owe or how much does he get in a refund?
